tool_description: Flowcode is an API that allows users to create QR codes in various image formats. It provides a simple interface for generating QR codes that can link to any URL.

api_list.name: Create QR Code
api_list.description: This API takes a URL and returns an image for a QR Code in either SVG, PNG, JPG, or PDF format.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL that the QR code will link to.

required_parameters.name: imageType
required_parameters.description: The format of the response image. Options include PNG, SVG, PDF, or JPG.

optional_parameters.name: bgColor
optional_parameters.description: Hex background color for the QR code. Format: #rrggbb or 'transparent' for a transparent background.

optional_parameters.name: fgColor
optional_parameters.description: Hex foreground color for the QR code. Format: #rrggbb.

optional_parameters.name: rimTextTop
optional_parameters.description: Text to display at the top of the rim for style 'rim'.

optional_parameters.name: style
optional_parameters.description: Style of the QR code. Options include 'default', 'inset', or 'rim'.

optional_parameters.name: moduleShape
optional_parameters.description: Shape to use for the QR code pattern. Options include 'default', 'circle', 'square', or 'diamond'.

optional_parameters.name: rimTextBottom
optional_parameters.description: Text to display at the bottom of the rim for style 'rim'.
